pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Discovery for Categorical Data with Label Permutation // Discover causality for bivariate categorical data. This package aims to enable users to discover causality for bivariate observational categorical data. See Ni, Y. (2022) arXiv:2209.08579 "Bivariate Causal Discovery for Categorical Data via Classification with Optimal Label Permutation. Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 35 (in press)".
